title: You know what I'd like to know?
body: Who the hell IS Luden, Zhonya, Youmuu, Lord Dominik, Rabaddon, Sterak, Doran, The Ruined King, Rylai, Seraph, Bami, Athene, Banshee, Caulfield, The Dead Man, Guinsoo, Jaurim, Kirchei, Liandry, Mejai, Mikael, The Iron Solari, Mercury, Randuin, Runaan, Targon, Warmog?

replies.body:
You can find these out on the LoL Wiki under "item trivia"

{{item:3036}} 
The item was named after Lord Dominik. This summoner was known as one of the community lead of CIS fan-site."

{{item:3285}} 
The name "Luden's Echo" comes from a player who reached 1000 referrals on the old Refer A Friend system

{{item:3142}} 
This item is a reference to Youmu Konpaku from the Touhou Project series.

{{item:3089}} 
was originally named Banksy's Deathcap in the Patch Day Preview. This is a tribute to one of Riot's employees named Banksy (David Banks, Director of Platform Engineering).

and a couple things are just Lore related.

Like Blade of the Ruined King is a reference to the king of the Shadow Isles 
Doran is supposedly a great weapon maker and was the same person who crafted Wukongs staff.

etc etc

just use the wiki and you can find out most of what you want to know.

http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/League_of_Legends_Wiki

Athene's unholy grail is named after the player athene
guinsoo's rageblade is named after guinsoo.
Doran is probably a blacksmith or artisan because he made the 3 starting items and wukongs staff.
